review: Super easy to install (even install is just not the right word - you just plug in and start using it) and use it immediately. Picture is crisp and it performs better than my cable-on-demand. No stutter at all. Excellent all around. Although I write computer games for a living, I'm a hardware technophobe...which is why I didn't get it sooner. I've had Amazon Prime for many years, and this just adds even more value. (Probably get Hula Plus and Netflix too....and debating to get rid of Cable-TV entirely now).
